"Charging Lance Beasts":
"Oh, dude, what a total shock! When I went to the
Skyscape over on Amduskia for the first time, I saw
this male and female pair of dragorii. The Nordiransa
and Fordransa, apparently. But they looked kinda like
some dragorii I saw over in the Cauldron. I could totally
handle them now that I'm so awesome, but still, I think
I'll have you try it first. You know, just in case.

*Target: Hostiles level 34 or higher"

"いやいやいや、ビックリだぜ。
こないだ惑星アムドゥスキアの浮遊大陸に
初めて行ったんだけどよ。
ノーディランサとフォードランサって
火山洞窟にいた雄雌の龍族みてーなのが
いたんだよ。
まあ、今の俺なら楽勝だろうけど、念には
念をってやつ？ てなわけで、よろしく！

※Lv.34～のエネミーが対象"
